articles.description: Six-time Super Bowl-winning quarterback Tom Brady has gathered some of his new Tampa Bay teammates for a two-hour throwing session ahead of a unique NFL season.
articles.content:
It's not unusual for quarterbacks to organise passing workouts before training camp, but the pandemic has changed normal routines.
Teams have had to rely on virtual meetings instead of traditional off-season programs as the NFL tries to make plans for a 2020… [+1089 chars]

articles.title: I delivered MJ’s ‘flu game’ pizza. This is why his trainer’s story is wrong - Fox Sports
articles.description: Whatever was ailing Michael Jordan in the famous “Flu Game” wasn’t bad pizza, says the man who claims to have delivered the food to the Hall of Famer that night.
articles.content:
Initially, it was reported at the time Jordan had flu-like symptoms in Game 5 of the 1997 NBA Finals against the Jazz.
Then during The Last Dance finale on Sunday night, it was revealed he had pizza the night before and got sick overnight. 
Catch up on the … [+2481 chars]

articles.title: Shane Warne v Steve Waugh - how a stats piece reignited 21-year-old grudge | ESPNcricinfo.com - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: In 1999, Waugh had dropped Warne for the final Test against West Indies with the series on the line | https://www.espncricinfo.com/story/_/id/29193071/how-stats-piece-reignited-21-year-old-grudge
articles.content:
Last week ESPNcricinfo published a stats piece about run-outs, with the top figure being that Steve Waugh had been involved in the most of any player during an international career - and that on 73 occasions it was his partner who ended up walking back.
Ther… [+3024 chars]

articles.title: Tasmanian tiger: Unearthed footage shows last-known glimpse of extinct marsupial - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Unearthed footage shows last-known glimpse of extinct Tasmanian tiger
articles.content: Unearthed footage of the Tasmanian Tiger has been released in what is the last-known glimpse of Australias most famous extinct predator.The National Film and Sound Archive of Australia (NSFA) posted the footage on Tuesday, announcing “we have released a 21-se… [+1478 chars]

articles.title: Magpies training spat could’ve been avoided with ‘better communication’ - Fox Sports
articles.description: Hawthorn legend Jason Dunstall believes “better communication” was required between Australian Olympic athlete Morgan Mitchell and the Collingwood Football Club, following a training spat on Monday.
articles.content:
It was revealed on Tuesday morning that Mitchell and her team were not impressed when a security guard instructed them to take their training session elsewhere, after using the Holden Centre running track on the first day of AFL training.
Under AFL protocols… [+2379 chars]
